name: Dragonflesh Golem
description: The Dragonflesh Golem is a large, powerful construct resembling a hulking creature made from the flesh of dragons, with robust armor and an imposing presence.
memorable: Its unique ability to frighten creatures with its Terror Stare and unleash devastating area damage with Elemental Breath makes it a distinct threat on the battlefield.
goals: To serve its creator and dominate adversaries in combat.
relations: Often created by powerful spellcasters or artisans who seek to control a devastating combat force.
environment: Typically found in the lairs of its creators or in places of ancient magical significance.
strengths: High strength and constitution allow it to deliver powerful attacks and withstand significant damage, while its magic resistance provides additional durability against spells.
weaknesses: Low dexterity leads to reduced agility and potential difficulties in avoiding attacks.
attacks: Utilizes powerful bite and claw melee attacks, and can frighten foes with its Terror Stare.
most_powerful_ability: Elemental Breath attacks in a 30-foot cone, dealing significant multi-type damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to see in darkness.
additional_information: Immutable form prevents alteration by spells.
Magic resistance provides advantage against magical effects.
Attacks are considered magical, bypassing resistances.
Can frighten its foes, hindering their abilities in battle.
Absorbs elemental damage types for a diverse attack pattern.
test_queries: large magical construct with dragon flesh
powerful golem capable of frightening enemies
large creature with magic resistance and powerful melee attacks
